markdownRemark.html: Language School located in the beautiful town of Nerja in the Costa del Sol, near Malaga in Andalusia, Spain. They are accredited by the Instituto Cervantes and offer courses at very affordable prices for beginners up to advanced. Spanish Language School Quorum offers useful Spanish Courses, each one with its own meaningful purpose.

frontmatter.title: Centro de idiomas quorum
